messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: I am Jack Duffin, a Hillingdon Resident. I have eight yearsâ€™ experience in hospitality, working my way up from Kitchen Porter to a Chef. I got into politics through my drive to improve the quality of education in this country. UKIP are the only major political party promising to keep a two runway Heathrow, scrap HS2 and bring in an Australian Style points system for immigration.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Improve the quality of education in the country.
Bring in an Australian Style points system for immigration.

issues.education: Improve the quality of education in the country.
issues.immigration: Bring in an Australian Style points system for immigration.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am Jack Duffin, a Hillingdon Resident. I have eight years' experience in hospitality, working my way up from Kitchen Porter to a Chef.

images.caption: JACK DUFFIN in Uxbridge and South Ruislip - Standing Up for Real Change
